info.title: Financial Data API
info.description: Comprehensive financial data API providing stock quotes, historical prices, company information, financial statements, market data, and more for publicly traded US and international companies.

get.description: Get a list of stock symbols for publicly traded US and international companies. There is a limit of 500 records per API call.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: API key for authentication

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial position of the record subset

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned data

get.description: Retrieve stock symbols for international companies from Toronto, London, Frankfurt, Paris, Amsterdam, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Korea, Brazil, Mexico, India, Bombay exchanges. Limit of 500 records per call.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: API key for authentication

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial position of the record subset

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned data

get.description: Get real-time stock quotes including last price, change, and percentage change. Timezone: EST. Limit of 300 records per call.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: API key for authentication

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Comma-separated trading symbols, e.g., MSFT,AAPL

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format of the returned data
